title: Now, drive up to 20 km on expressways for free per day with satellite navigation
description: Vehicles with a functional GNSS can now travel up to 20 km daily on highways and expressways without paying tolls, as per the amended National Highways Fee Rules. Fees will be charged based on actual distance traveled beyond 20 km. This initiative is part of a pilot program integrating GNSS-based toll collection with the existing FASTag system.
